mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPLY_ATTACH(UUID,PATH,IMAGE,RNO) VALUES(#{uuid},#{path},1,(SELECT (LAST_NUMBER)-1 FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME='SEQ_REPLY'))
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET PW = #{user_pwd}, EMAIL = #{user_email}, PHONE = #{user_tel1}, PHONE2 = #{user_tel2}, PHONE3 = #{user_tel3}, UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE, NICKNAME = #{user_nickname} WHERE USERID = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT RNO, NICKNAME, REGDATE, STOREID, CONTENT, QCSJ_C000000000400001, UUID, PATH, STORENAME FROM (select * from TBL_store full join TBL_REPLY using(storeid)) full join tbl_reply_attach Using(rno) WHERE NICKNAME=#{NICKNAME} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT_ATTACH(UUID,PATH,IMAGE,PRODUCTID) VALUES(#{uuid},#{path},1,(SELECT (LAST_NUMBER)-1 FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME='SEQ_PRODUCT'))

INSERT ALL INTO TBL_ORDER(ORDERID,ORDERNAME,CREATEDATE,PAID,EMAIL,ADDRESS,USERID,PHONE,RECIPIENT) VALUES(SEQ_ORDER.NEXTVAL,#{ORDERNAME},SYSDATE,#{PAID},#{EMAIL},#{ADDRESS},#{USERID},#{PHONE},#{RECIPIENT}) INTO TBL_PAYMENT(PAYMENTNUM,PAYMENTPRICE,PAYMENTDATE,PAYMENTSTATUS,USERID,ORDERID) VALUES(#{PAYMENTNUM},#{PAYMENTPRICE},SYSDATE,#{PAID},#{USERID},SEQ_ORDER.NEXTVAL) select * from DUAL

INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER_ITEM(ORDERITEMID,QUANTITY,CREATEDATE,PRICE,PRODUCTID,ORDERID) VALUES(SEQ_ORDER_ITEM.NEXTVAL,#{QUANTITY},SYSDATE,#{PRICE},#{PRODUCTID},(SELECT (LAST_NUMBER)-1 FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME='SEQ_ORDER'))
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT STOREID,HOTELID,NAME,STARRATE,STORENAME,ADDRESS,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,UUID,PATH,COMMENTS,PRICE,INFO,TEL,(6371 * acos( cos( radians(#{LATITUDE}) ) * cos( radians(latitude) ) * cos( radians(longitude) - radians(#{LONGITUDE}) ) + sin( radians(#{LATITUDE}) ) * sin( radians(latitude) ) ) ) AS distance FROM V_CUSTOM) where distance <= 2 order by storeid
